participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Resilient and determined, Jessica is someone who faces challenges head-on and strives for a better future.
participant_1.background: i recently was fired and had to get a new job. i work in the insurance business. my mom passed away when i was young. my father is in the army.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Friendly and easygoing, Michael enjoys connecting with others and sharing stories about his life experiences.
participant_2.background: i drive a nissan pathfinder. i met taylor swift. my favourite music is country music. i'm a convenience store manager.
